name: Jacob Long
description: Long is a resident ofDogtownwho attempted to start a business without paying a "registration fee" toKurt Hansen. As retaliation,Barghestamputated his left leg. In revenge, he plans to steal anairdropfrom them with the aid ofTaylor Gibbs, despite the latter's doubts.While going up the abandoned hotel with Gibbs onElizabeth Kressstreet to get a good vantage point, the duo unknowingly stumble uponVand PresidentRosalind Myershiding in theKress Street Hideout.
